title: What Do You Call Your Champions/Champions in General?
body:
I'm Blazoir. I was just thinking about pronunciation and Nicknames for Champs
Shaco is a Common one. Shay-co or Shack-o?
Vole-bear or Volee-bear
Gal-i-o or Gol-i-o
Illaoi can be commonly mispronounced as well
For nicknames, We have Koggy for sure
Fifi (Fiora)
Ziggy
Graggy
Wee-Woo
Susan...etc.
What others do you all have?

EDIT: I Bumped this thing up, just because 7 months have come by, with new champions. START

replies.body:
Mord(e)
Mordhuekaiser
HueKaiser
Muertekaiser
Numero Uno
Mordy
.
.
.
Huedekaiser.

I've always called Anivia Aniv, bird, or Articuno :3

Some other fun callouts/nicknames that me and my buds use are

Klassy-win
Mister Yi
and Swain-Train.

ha. I do that with some champs...I  call Maokai Mowmow, or MeowMeow. Don't judge me...

usually i just switch around the first syllables or first consonant of the champ's names if they have multiple words as their name and i just switch around some of the consonants if they only have one word as their name
example: see lin
or sometimes
treemo
